reviewText: My son is in his 30s and get watched superted until the vhs tape poped. So I got it as a gift he was so excited.

I have liked SuperTed for the past 25 years. I was happy to find the set - this is the complete series  1-3 .  I have bought other compilations that have had a few episodes, but this compilation has more episodes than I have been able to find in any other compilation.  Remember - this is a region 2 item and won't play in most US dvd or blu ray players.
My daughter loves her Teddy bear and so this cartoon was perfect for her. It also brought back a lot of memories for myself.
